body_html: Sorry I don't follow your suggestion. You can concat the rewards but you have to concat the decisions as well to match the shape, which loses stochasticity. My most desirable use case to concat the decisions over many time steps and backprop once for efficiency. Correct me if I am wrong.

body: Sorry I don't follow your suggestion. You can concat the rewards but you have to concat the decisions as well to match the shape, which loses stochasticity. My most desirable use case to concat the decisions over many time steps and backprop once for efficiency. Correct me if I am wrong.
